verbs.description: In an unprecedented act of rebellion , Eleven states [V: have] ended cooperation with a White House initiative to deploy the National Guard to the US - Mexico border in protest over Trump 's family - separation policy and the mistreatment of children .

[ARGM-ADV: In an unprecedented act of rebellion] , [ARG0: Eleven states] have [V: ended] [ARG1: cooperation with a White House initiative to deploy the National Guard to the US - Mexico border] [ARGM-PRP: in protest over Trump 's family - separation policy and the mistreatment of children] .

In an unprecedented act of rebellion , Eleven states have ended cooperation with a White House initiative to [V: deploy] [ARG1: the National Guard] [ARG2: to the US - Mexico border] in protest over Trump 's family - separation policy and the mistreatment of children .
